column18: 07/11/2002: A convoy carrying ballot boxes was attacked with petrol bombs on its way into the provincial capital of Wabag, in Papau New Guinea. No one was reported injured, and no group claimed responsibility.
column39: Convoy carrying ballot boxes in Wabag
column64: The specific motive was to disrupt voting and destroy ballot boxes.
column108: Several vehicles were damaged in this attack.
column126: \\"\"Convoy Carrying Boces to PNG Count Petrol-Bombed"

column239: The hostages were released but the tribesmen took their weapons.
